author: Caitlin Conant
title: 2020 Daily Trail Markers: Bernie Sanders suspends his campaign
description: He told supporters today, "I congratulate Joe Biden, a very decent man, on his victory."
content: Bernie Sanders ended his campaign for president this morning, reports CBS News campaign reporter Cara Korte. "Today, I am announcing the suspension of active campaigning, and congratulate Joe Biden, a very decent man, on his victory," he said, addressing supp… [+24485 chars]
